thread.title: Crisolles wins Belmont Park feature
thread.title_full: Crisolles wins Belmont Park feature - Yahoo Sports

author: yahoo
title: Crisolles wins Belmont Park feature
text:
Done NEW YORK (AP) -- Crisolles raced to her first U.S. victory Friday in the $85,000 allowance feature for fillies and mares at Belmont Park.
The 4-year-old set the pace in the 1 3/8-mile race, beating Queen's Parade by a half-length. She had never run beyond 1 1/4 miles in her previous 11 races in the U.S. and France.
Joel Rosario guided Crisolles to her fourth win, coming in her third New York start for trainer Christophe Clement.
Crisolles paid $6.80, $3.50 and $2.40.
Queen's Parade returned $5 and $3. Pine Needles, the 2-1 favorite also trained by Clement, returned $2.50 to show.
The time was 2:14.23 over the firm turf course.
Sports & Recreation Horse Racing Belmont Park   5379/10000   29359/79545   1923/4772
